attributes.action: CLOSE DOWN LITTLE RASCALS PUPPY FARM IN LINCS
attributes.additional_details:
LITTLE RASCALS (also known as SMART PUPS) in
Lincolnshire
LN5 0RW

is a puppy factory selling sick puppies bred in horrendous conditions.
.
Bitches are bred to death, many are kept in appalling conditions,they never have a kind loving word,a fire to lay in front of.They never know LOVE.

They have a life of misery and are disposed of when they are no longer able to produce puppies. They are used to earn the owners many thousands of pounds a year.

Little Rascals in Lincolnshire has,from, North Kesteven council,a license for 200 breeding bitches.


for more information go to
http://www.bbc.co.uk/insideout/extra/series-1/puppy_farms.shtml
